products.main_description:
Description

  • Flavor: Dates
  • Benefits: This Syrup comes with no added sugar and preservatives for your daily need and diet
  • Ingredients: Natural Dates
  • Weight: 280gm, Pack of 1
  • Storage Instructions: Store in a cool, hygienic and dry place, away from direct sunlight and strong odor in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening the pack.
  • Healthy alternative to refined sugar, honey, maple syrup, or agave syrup
  • Delicious Natural Sweetener for beverages, energy bars, baby food and baked goods
  • Enhances rich flavors and a super alternative to sugar

Our date syrup can be used in addition to or instead of honey or syrup, and as a substitute for refined sugar in baking and cooking. Mix in cereal or coffee for a hint of sweetness.

Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.

products.main_description:
Description

 

 

Ingredients

About this item

Honey’s proven nutritional and health-aiding benefits make it the most valuable ingredient to include in diets. Being anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial, and anti-tumour, a moderate intake of honey is useful in treating and preventing various illnesses.

  • Fights Diabetes
  • Boosts Immunity
  • Reduces Blood Pressure
  • Helps in Weight loss

Storage Instruction: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening

Allergy caution: contains tree nuts Hygienically packed in facility meeting food safety standards Packed in an integrated nuts and dried fruits unit and may contain occasional traces of other nuts and dried fruits

Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.

additional_info.some_additional_info: Add any additional information specific to this product here.

additional_information.benefits: Dates are probably the healthiest of all dry fruits. A good source of antioxidants, fiber, proteins, minerals and a range of vitamins, dates can keep diseases at bay, boost brain health, and give you glowing skin. Everyone, irrespective of age and gender, can reap the health benefits of dates, provided they consume it daily.
additional_information.storage_instructions: Store in a cool, hygienic and dry place, away from direct sunlight and strong odor in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening the pack.
additional_information.health_benefits: Regular intake of dates has proved beneficial for improving cognitive function and regulating blood pressure. Although dates have a high carb content, they boast a low glycemic index. The presence of fiber helps slow down the carb absorption process, preventing blood sugar spikes. The fiber in the fruit also keeps your digestive system healthy. With high levels of antioxidants, dates can prevent oxidative stress caused by free radicals in your body.
additional_facts: Seven dates, or 40 grams, is equal to 80-160 grams of fresh fruit
Dates are the best source of Potassium (2.4 times higher than banana)
Dates contains simple sugars (glucose and fructose) that the body uses to feed its energy requirements and doesn’t convert into fat
40 grams of dates per day provides 12% of the daily recommended fiber for maintaining a healthy digestive system.
Dates are fat-free. They can add natural sweetness to dishes without adding fat.
Dates are rich in iron. They protect against anaemia and are good for individuals who suffer from it.
Dates are 'brain food' because their phosphorus content promotes brain cell growth.
additional_information.delivery_info: Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from the order date.

With high levels of antioxidants, dates can prevent oxidative stress caused by free radicals in your body.
  • Seven dates, or 40 grams, is equal to 80-160 grams of fresh fruit  Dates are the best source of Potassium (2.4 times higher than banana)  Dates contains simple sugars (glucose and fructose) that the body used to feed its energy requirements and doesn’t convert into fat  40 grams of dates per day provides 12% of the daily recommended fibre for maintaining a healthy digestive system.  Dates are fat-free. They can add natural sweetness to dishes without adding fat.
  • Dates are rich in iron. They protect against anaemia and are good for individuals who suffer from it.  Dates are “brain food” because their phosphorus content promotes brain cell growth.
  • Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.

products.main_description:
Description

Our Ajwa Dates are exclusive dates that are 100% natural, cholesterol free and contain no added sugar. These superfoods are packed with antioxidants and essential minerals. We offer three different box sizes, with a clear window to see the prized quality.

  • Nutritional Information: Nutrition Facts per 100 G, Energy: 320 kcal, Protein: 2.3 g, Carbohydrate: 77 g, Invert Sugar: 60.9g, Dietary Fibre: 8.8 g, Saturated Fat: 0 g, Cholestrol: 0 g, Iron: 8.1 mg, Sodium: 24.6 mg, Calcium: 2.5 mg, Vitamin C: 18 mg
  • Serving Recommendation: 40 grams of dates per day provides 12% of the daily recommended fiber for maintaining a healthy digestive system.
  • Product Benefits: HEALTHY AND NUTRITIOUS – These nutrient-rich dried dates make fantastic snacks at any time of the day. Rich in carbohydrates and dietary fibers, they are great energy boosters and well-known for their high mineral content
  • Allergen Information: No Artificial Flavour, No Additives, No Preservatives | Safety Warning: May contain traces of nuts
  • GOURMET QUALITY – Ajwa dates are a soft, moist variety of date fruit, grown in Saudi Arabia in the region of Al Madina Al Munawara and characterized by their deep dark black colour, medium size, and round in shape
  • Store in a cool, hygienic and dry place, away from direct sunlight and strong odor in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening the pack.
  • Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.

products.benefits: Dates are probably the healthiest of all dry fruits. A good source of antioxidants, fibre, proteins, minerals and a range of vitamins, dates can keep diseases at bay, boost brain health and give you glowing skin. Everyone, irrespective of age and gender, can reap the health benefits of dates, provided they consume it daily.
products.storage_instructions: Store in a cool, hygienic and dry place, away from direct sunlight and strong odor in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening the pack.
health_benefits: Regular intake of dates has proved beneficial for improving cognitive function and regulating blood pressure.
Although dates have a high carb content, they boast a low glycemic index. The presence of fibre helps slow down the carb absorption process, preventing blood sugar spikes.
The fibre in the fruit also keeps your digestive system healthy.
With high levels of antioxidants, dates can prevent oxidative stress caused by free radicals in your body.
Seven dates, or 40 grams, is equal to 80-160 grams of fresh fruit.
Dates are the best source of Potassium (2.4 times higher than banana).
Dates contain simple sugars (glucose and fructose) that the body uses to feed its energy requirements and doesn’t convert into fat.
40 grams of dates per day provides 12% of the daily recommended fibre for maintaining a healthy digestive system.
Dates are fat-free. They can add natural sweetness to dishes without adding fat.
Dates are rich in iron. They protect against anaemia and are good for individuals who suffer from it.
Dates are 'brain food' because their phosphorus content promotes brain cell growth.
products.delivery_info: Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.

Description

 

 

IngredientsHoney
Diet TypeVegetarian
Package WeightAvailable in 280gms
UnitPack of 1

This is a Vegetarian product.

About this item

Honey’s proven nutritional and health-aiding benefits make it the most valuable ingredient to include in diets. Being anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial, and anti-tumour, a moderate intake of honey is useful in treating and preventing various illnesses.

  • Fights Diabetes
  • Boosts Immunity
  • Reduces Blood Pressure
  • Helps in Weight loss

Storage Instruction: Store in a cool, dry place in an airtight container and preferably refrigerate after opening

Allergy caution: contains tree nuts Hygienically packed in facility meeting food safety standards Packed in an integrated nuts and dried fruits unit and may contain occasional traces of other nuts and dried fruits

Order will be delivered in 2-7 working days from order date.
